0.name: JavaScript
0.description: Development of interactive functions such as form validation and DOM manipulation through event handling. Integration of APIs and external services.

1.name: TypeScript
1.description: Development of applications using TypeScript as the main language.

2.name: Node.js
2.description: Use Node.js to build and maintain RESTful APIs with Express. Develop backend logic and connect to relational databases. Handle asynchronous operations, background tasks, and third-party API integration. Implemented real-time communication features using WebSockets in Node.js, enabling live data updates between server and client.

3.name: Dart
3.description: Front-end development of applications using Dart.

4.name: PHP
4.description: Development of dynamic web applications. Connection and manipulation of MySQL databases, using PHP to perform data queries, insertions, updates, and deletions. Security and prevention of attacks. Integration of external APIs and services.

5.name: Vue.js
5.description: SPA. Creation of components, data manipulation in an Vue application through the use of properties and data binding, and integration of routes. Use of Vuex, routing and Apex.

6.name: Angular
6.description: SPA. Creation of components, data manipulation in an Angular application through the use of properties and data binding, and integration of routes.

7.name: MySQL
7.description: Database design using MySQL, structuring tables and data relationships, as well as performing complex SQL queries to retrieve and manipulate data from databases.

8.name: Three
8.description: Creating interactive 3D environments rendered in real time. Used to develop a virtual tablet where portfolio sections appear as dynamic apps inside a realistic scene.

9.name: SCSS (Sass)
9.description: CSS preprocessor adding variables, mixins, nesting, and modules. Compiles to CSS for more maintainable styling at scale.

10.name: HTML
10.description: Use of semantic tags to enhance page structure, as well as form validation.

11.name: CSS
11.description: Styling web pages, responsive design to create web pages that adapt to different screen sizes.

12.name: Flutter
12.description: Front-end development of applications using Flutter, including the interaction of custom widgets.

13.name: Bootstrap
13.description: Creating responsive pages, utilizing the grid system as well as Bootstrap components and plugins.

14.name: Materialize
14.description: Designing attractive and responsive interfaces, utilizing components such as cards, buttons, and navigation bars.
